description:
A red-haired military artist. He studied in Zuellni ten years ago. He is the sworn enemy of the Masked Wolf troops, as seen by his action of stopping them from taking Zuellni. He erased Nina`s memories of their fight and disappeared since. He uses a broad iron whip, he later taught his signature technique called the "Thunder Flash".
Source: en.wiki
name: Dixerio Maskane
